## isHost variable

Checks whether a given value is an [IHost](./common.ihost.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isHost: (arg: any) => arg is IHost
```

## Example

Here's an example of how to use this guard

```ts
const host = { id: '1', username: 'john', name: '}
isHost(host) // true

```
